Honestly, It is a good game but Valve screwed it up when they made the game free. Now there is Non-Prime and Prime. Due to trust-factor which is determined on how many people report you, your experience is easily ruined by cheaters because, if you have low trust-factor you can get que'd with non prime players that are potentially hacking. In the end it is a good game and can be rewarding at times.
yeah, so its free I dont know why you wouldnt buy it
